comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Could there be a missing character in "E.J. Berwi ND"? If not, what does the "ND" stand for?

comment.author: 66751273@N00
comment._content:
Not a missing letter, but an extra space.
Edward Julius Berwind, a famous coal baron.
;-)

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Perfect - thank you! I'll replace my tag.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: For more pictures of the Edgar house (bottom right), see Commodore William Edgar House, 29 Old Beach Road in HABS hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/hhh.ri0046 The HABS information for Elms, middle left, is at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/hhh.ri0049 Belmead, middle right, appears to have been divided up. You could currently buy a "townhouse" in it. See www.christiesgreatestates.com/properties/view_70156/
